strapiPost.title: Bentonville Chamber Partners With Cloud Company For Remote Worker Program
strapiPost.content:
For those of you who have decided to work with the utmost autonomy this next piece of news is for you as there’s a new remote working program in Bentonville.

  • Cloud tech: Through its Rural Empowerment Program, Pax8 is hiring remote workers in the Northwest Arkansas Region. The company is connecting rural communities with tech careers, focusing on small to mid-sized businesses, and cloud serviced based technology.
  • New gig: Pax8 has been on Inc. magazine’s annual list of the 5,000 fastest-growing companies 4 years in a row and is currently offering jobs with a range from $50k to over $160k per year. Positions range from entry to senior-level roles. 

Click HERE for job information. Learn more about the Rural Empowerment Program and Pax8 HERE.
